TextBlock.Text: ASTERA: The Memory Orb responds to nearby life, capturing movement patterns in full detail. It feels similar to the hologram projectors we made, but less anchored.
ZOSTE: Once recorded, it can recreate a ghostly version of whoever activated it. The projection mirrors your past steps exactly, down to pressure and timing.
ZOSTE: We've rigged the room with two distant pressure plates. A single Nomai can trigger both using the orb if they plan their movements carefully.
ZOSTE: Synchronization with your past self is the solution to revealing the key.
